text: Gerben J. Zylstra (born January 3, 1959)https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QJ46-KVTJhttps://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QJ72-1MBShttps://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QJLM-1ZJKhttps://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:KP8G-HL5 is an American biochemist, currently Distinguished Professor at Rutgers University and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==References== Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:Rutgers University faculty Category:American biochemists Category:Living people Category:1959 births
title: Gerben Zylstra
